testcase.classname: Enter contact details on GCE contact Page
testcase.name: Mandatory field validation on Contact Page
testcase.system-out: Given User open the browser.................................................passed When User navigates to GCE homepage.........................................passed When User Clicks on Contact Menu on HomePage................................passed Then enter details in contact form "Rajni Ranjan","rajni.ranjan@clairvoyantsoft.com","4322305947","Clairvoyant","Other".passed Then user clicks on submit button...........................................passed Then validate the error message "This field is required."...................passed Then close the browser......................................................passed
